text: ¶ For the statutes of Omri are kept, and all the works of the house of Ahab, and ye walk in their counsels; that I should make thee a desolation, and the inhabitants thereof an hissing: therefore ye shall bear the reproach of my people.6.16 For the…: or, For he doth much keep the, etc6.16 desolation: or, astonishment
